SELECT u.username, u.parent_name, u.m_balance, COALESCE(sum( o.total_price ),0) as order_price,
COALESCE(sum( o.win_mount ),0) as win_mount ,
COALESCE(sum( o.win_lose_amount),0) as win_lose_amount,
COALESCE(sum( r.money ) ,0) as recharge,
COALESCE( abs( sum( w.money )),0) as withdrawal,
COALESCE(sum( r.money )/sum( o.total_price ),0) as win_rate from sys_user u left JOIN ( select * from mks_quiz_orders where create_time between #{p.startTime} and #{p.endTime} ) o ON u.id = o.member_id LEFT JOIN (select * from mks_money_log where order_type=6 and create_time between #{p.startTime} and #{p.endTime} ) r ON u.id = r.user_id LEFT JOIN (select * from mks_money_log where order_type=5 and create_time between #{p.startTime} and #{p.endTime} ) w ON u.id = w.user_id
1=1 and u.site_id=#{p.siteId} and u.type='APP' GROUP BY u.id ORDER BY sum( r.money ) DESC
